backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with authorization, blob storage, and extensive type/state definitions for users, subscriptions, posts, marketplace listings, payments, and quotas.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and component functionality.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Defines asset rules, cache policies, and security headers for frontend deployment on the IC.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining light/dark CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, loading Google Analytics, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring sections, navigation, context state, authentication, and generator/prompt studio logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthEntryDi: Authentication dialog with sign‑in/up tabs, Google login, error handling, and success flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/ContinueWit: Reusable Google‑styled button that triggers Internet Identity login with loading states.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides sign‑in/out UI using Internet Identity with Google branding and an auth dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/decor/SparkleOve: Decorative sparkle overlay with optional animation respecting reduced‑motion preference.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Shows a dismissible diagnostics banner in development when backend connectivity or config issues are detected.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Float: Floating button that appears after scrolling and scrolls smoothly to the top.
Floating action button that scrolls to the Create Wish section with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Top‑fixed gradient progress bar that reflects page scroll position.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Stick: Sticky navigation bar with active‑section highlighting and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Renders a badge indicating the user's plan tier (free, pro, or creator).
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Wraps children with an optional fade‑in animation triggered on scroll into view.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: React‑query hooks fetching authenticated user data: download history, saved templates, and creator earnings.
frontend/src/features/admin/AccessDenied: Displays a card informing the user they lack admin access.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPayment: Admin UI to view, filter, and update payment requests with approval/rejection actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAll: Fetches all payment requests via the actor using React Query.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useIsA: Checks if the authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useUpd: Mutation hook to update a payment request’s status and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/auth/useUserAuthUp: Upserts user auth data after login by calling the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Provides canvas drawing utilities like vignette, glow text, shadows, sparkles, and confetti for card rendering.
Generates a full canvas-rendered card with theme, text fitting, decorations, and effects applied.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardTex: Sanitizes and formats card text, removing placeholders and generating default titles.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardThe: Defines premium card themes with fonts, colors, assets, and decoration styles.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/compone: A React carousel for browsing image variations with swipe, keyboard, and button navigation, tracking selected index.
Canvas-based confetti animation triggered on demand, respecting reduced‑motion settings and calling an optional completion callback.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/enhance: Applies subtle contrast, vignette, and sharpening effects to a canvas without altering text content.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/fitText: Utilities to fit text into bounded canvas regions by adjusting font size, line height, and calculating safe text areas.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/generat: Returns preset card design variation parameters affecting decoration offsets, lighting, and layout.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image with cross‑origin support and returns it as a Promise.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Generates a printable PDF-like page in a new window using styled HTML based on a BirthdayPack.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/shortWi: Converts arbitrary wish text into a 15–20 word, card‑safe message with cleanup, shortening, or expansion as needed.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Provides text‑wrapping utilities for canvas, including emoji‑aware wrapping and optional line limits.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Displays a summary card for a community post with follow and view actions, showing metadata and creator info.
Shows a dialog with full community post details and a follow button if viewing another creator's post.
Provides a dialog form for authenticated users to create a new community post with title, description, and type.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: React Query hooks for fetching all community posts or a single post from the backend actor.
Mutation hook for creating a community post and updating cached lists with success and error handling.
Manages following creators using localStorage, backend subscription, and React Query state updates.
frontend/src/features/examples/component: Renders a stylized example wish card with emojis, themes, and interactive variation switching.
frontend/src/features/examples/exampleWi: Maps relationships and tones to emoji sets and provides helpers to enhance wish titles, bodies, and decorations.
Formats a SampleWish into a title and a short 1–2 sentence body with length limits and greeting cleanup.
Maps wishes to visual style tags using explicit tags or tone-based fallbacks.
Provides typography and background theme selection using seeded randomness to generate consistent card themes.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines the SampleWish interface and a set of predefined example wishes with metadata.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Exports fixed option lists for relationships, tones, languages, and personality traits.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a generated BirthdayPack into a decorated multiline message string.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Generates a complete BirthdayPack by combining language phrases with user form data across several wish formats.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides language-specific phrase sets and a helper to select the correct pack.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Randomly fills generator form fields using preset lists, keeping the provided name when possible.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Declares enums and interfaces for generator options, form data, and BirthdayPack structure.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: Implements a dialog UI for creating marketplace listings, handling auth, form state, validation, and submission.
Displays a marketplace listing card with title, description, seller, price, and a button to open a purchase request dialog.
Modal dialog allowing buyers to send a prefilled message to sellers, copy it, open WhatsApp, or record interest via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: React Query mutation for creating marketplace listings and invalidating listing queries with success and error toasts.
Mutation that records buyer interest on a listing and triggers UI feedback and query invalidation.
Fetches interaction count for a listing when authenticated using a React Query query.
Provides queries to fetch all marketplace listings or a single listing using the actor API.
frontend/src/features/payments/hooks/use: Mutation for submitting a payment request with email, plan, amount, UTR, and optional screenshot, with cache invalidation.
Query to fetch the authenticated user's payment requests from the backend.
frontend/src/features/payments/manualUpi: Defines constants for UPI payments including UPI ID, payee name, and QR image path.
UI step showing UPI payment instructions, QR code, and options to copy UPI ID or open UPI apps.
Utility for storing and retrieving the user's payment email from local storage.
Form to submit payment details including email, UTR, and optional screenshot, then trigger a payment request mutation.
Generates a UPI deep link URL for a payment based on plan and amount.
Disables Razorpay and provides a stub upgrade handler indicating manual UPI flow is active.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays a grid of upcoming premium card features with icons and descriptions.
Provides UI controls for customizing card appearance, including background, typography, colors, alignment, and photo upload.
Handles downloading, sharing, and copying text for premium cards using export utilities and share APIs.
Main module managing theme selection and card design steps, combining preview, customization, and export actions.
Renders a live preview of the premium card with theme styling, animations, emojis, and optional photo placement.
Defines the list of premium card themes and a helper to fetch themes by ID.
Contains TypeScript types for themes, designer settings, and the premium designer state structure.
Custom hook managing all state and setters for the premium card designer configuration.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/compo: Renders two disabled premium feature buttons (video and voice) that trigger a 'coming soon' toast.
Displays prompt analysis values as labeled badges for event type, tone, theme, and layout.
Provides fields to edit title, message, footer, tone, and buttons to regenerate text or designs.
Textarea input for prompt entry with example prompts and a generate button with loading state.
Carousel UI allowing navigation between multiple card variations with previous/next controls.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/event: Maps event types to recommended card themes and exposes a helper to retrieve the theme.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/gener: Simulates AI generation of three card variations by detecting event type and tone from the prompt.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/promp: Rule‑based prompt analyzer extracting event type, tone, visual theme, layout style, and keywords.
Generates title, message, and footer text from prompt analysis using predefined templates.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/types: Defines Prompt Studio types including event, tone, theme enums, analysis structure, card content, and state model.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Implements local quota tracking with daily reset, incrementing, and remaining quota calculation.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: React hook that computes remaining message quota using backend for authenticated users or local storage for anonymous users.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata and entitlements for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers with helpers to access them.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: UI overlay component that blocks premium features and opens the pricing modal.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Modal component managing multi‑step plan comparison and manual payment flows with state transitions.
Renders a plan feature comparison table for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers.
frontend/src/features/subscription/UPGRA: Markdown checklist detailing manual tests for upgrade buttons, modal behavior, and payment flow.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: Hook that resolves the user's effective plan and entitlements based on subscription status.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: Hook that fetches and refreshes the user's subscription status from the backend.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: React view that loads a surprise payload, triggers confetti, reveals text with delays, and controls background music.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: React-query hooks for creating surprise links and fetching surprise payloads from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Utility that returns CSS class strings combining base layout styles with template-specific gradient themes.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Registry of static background image paths for templates with a helper to resolve an image key.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines template metadata including IDs, names, icons, gradients, and background image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Scroll-spy hook using IntersectionObserver to track the currently visible page section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook that reports whether a referenced element is in the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Hook managing a user's selected plan, persisting it to localStorage keyed by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's prefers-reduced-motion system setting via media queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching download history, saved templates, creator earnings, and for recording or saving items.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: React hook that tracks and updates document scroll progress using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Fetches and returns the authenticated user's principal by calling the backend, or null if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a dark theme, layout utilities, and custom UI effects like gradients and glassmorphism.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility that copies text to the clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Provides helpers for formatting timestamps into relative time strings or readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens a principal string by keeping prefix and suffix characters with an ellipsis.
frontend/src/lib/scroll.ts: Smooth scrolling utility that accounts for sticky header offset and reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share link with encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and provides Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Community feed section showing posts, filtering by followed creators, and supporting post creation and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Dashboard showing user stats, saved items, and admin tools, with authentication gating.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Displays sample wishes with tone filtering and allows applying an example to prefill the generator form.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Renders an FAQ section with a list of accordion-based questions and answers wrapped in a styled card.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Displays the site footer with brand info, quick links, legal links, and a dynamic copyright line.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the main wish generator UI with form inputs, randomization, AI generation handlers, and prompt-based creation mode.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Defines the homepage hero with branding, social proof, authentication prompts, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Shows Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy in styled card sections with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Provides a marketplace interface with search, filtering, listing display, and dialog for creating new listings.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Controls output rendering for generated cards, handling themes, previews, export actions, and prompt/quick-form modes.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Renders pricing plans with features and upgrade buttons using UI cards and modal triggers.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Displays selectable card templates and updates the chosen template in app state.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Razorpay payment options, responses, and global instance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, shadows, and plugin setup.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build and dev-server configuration with React plugin, env var injection, aliases, and API proxy.
project_state.json: Project metadata outlining current issues and requirements related to sidebar navigation and smooth scrolling.
